## Pre-Tasks (Agent must complete before starting)

- [ ] Read `AGENTS.md`
- [ ] Read `MEMORY.md`
- [ ] Read `memory/changelog.md` (recent entries)
- [ ] Check `memory/failures/` for related past attempts
- [ ] Identify relevant tests in `tests/`

## Post-Tasks (Agent must complete before declaring done)

- [ ] All acceptance criteria verified with evidence
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] New/modified behavior has test coverage
- [ ] `memory/changelog.md` updated
- [ ] `MEMORY.md` updated (if new knowledge discovered)
- [ ] `memory/failures/` updated (if something failed during implementation)
- [ ] PR opened with clear description
